ComicInfo.Title: The Mirror War [Part 4]
ComicInfo.Summary: The Mirror War [Part 4]: An assassination attempt against Picard results in the Enterprise dropping out of warp, causing them to be detected by the Regent Worf and the Klingon flagship. With unexpected help from Benjamin Sisko, the Enterprise escapes from the Klingons and arrives at Faundori, where they initiate their plan to take over the planet to build a new fleet of ships for the Empire.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 23:45:04. [CVDB905434] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:00:37. [Issue ID 2305321]
